de.tub.reader.directory
Class IterativeDirectoryReader

java.lang.Object
  de.tub.observer.Subject
      de.tub.reader.directory.IterativeDirectoryReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDirectoryReader, IReader, Cloneable
public class IterativeDirectoryReader
extends Subject
implements IDirectoryReader, Cloneable

This Reader reads all visible directories in the given root directory and delegates them to a given Reader or Processor. There is also the possibility to accept files in addition to directories.

It extends the Subject class to notify observers about a new child directory within the root directory when it is read and about the finishing of its work.

Author:
Sebastian Oelke

public IterativeDirectoryReader(IterativeDirectoryReader iterativeFolderReader)

Parameters:
iterativeFolderReader - The IterativeFolderReader which has to be copied.
See Also:
clone()
Method Detail

read

public void read()
This method informs this reader's observers with the NEW_CHILD_DIRECTORY_INTEREST if a new child directory was found and is now being processed. Furthermore, observers are notified with the HAS_FINISHED_INTEREST when this reader has finished its work.

Specified by:
read in interface IDirectoryReader
